items.title: Trump demands Fed's Cook resign after housing official calls for 'mortgage fraud' probe
items.description: Trump has targeted the Federal Reserve and its chairman, Jerome Powell, as he pressures the central bank to slash interest rates.

items.title: Trump tariff revenue expected to offset tax bill impact, S&P says in U.S. credit rating hold
items.description: S&P Global warned U.S. government debt credit ratings could "come under pressure" if political developments affect the independence of the Federal Res...

items.title: Trump has snapped up more than $100 million in bonds since taking office
items.description: The U.S. president has purchased hundreds of bonds issued by companies, local governments and school boards.

items.title: Trump expands 50% steel and aluminum tariffs to include 407 additional product types
items.description: President Donald Trump has often relied on sector-specific tariffs to enact his sprawling trade agenda.

items.title: Trump vows to target 'woke' museums with same playbook used on Columbia, Harvard
items.description: Trump's call for a repeat of his approach to colleges and universities suggests Smithsonian museums' funding could become a major pressure point.
